extendedInfo.description: Amazing sunshine,Real flowing water , and you can also say something to your father/children Through Children Live Wallpaper 3D rendered in OpenGL 2.0Free and always will beTake this chance to say something to your children !!Children Live Wallpaper support are supported on 4.2+ devices!Free and always will beTO USE:Home -> Press Menu -> Select Wallpapers -> Select Live Wallpapers -> Select Father's Day Live Wallpaper from the list*** Any problems ??, please send live.wall.std@gmail.com with your phone model ,so we can have enough info to help you ,Thanks!it's Dedicated to my dear father , Happy Father's Day !!
